section.title: Toolbox.Core.Options.FileTransferOptions Class Reference

para.para: Configuration options for file transfer services.

listitem.para: int GetDefaultPort ()
Gets the default port for the current protocol.
int GetEffectivePort ()
Gets the effective port, using the default if not explicitly set.
const string SectionName = "Toolbox:FileTransfer"
The configuration section name for binding.
string Host = string.Empty [get, set]
Gets or sets the server hostname or IP address.
int Port [get, set]
Gets or sets the server port.
string Username = string.Empty [get, set]
Gets or sets the username for authentication.
string? Password [get, set]
Gets or sets the password for authentication.
string? PrivateKeyPath [get, set]
Gets or sets the private key file path for SFTP key-based authentication.
string? PrivateKeyContent [get, set]
Gets or sets the private key content for SFTP key-based authentication.
string? PrivateKeyPassphrase [get, set]
Gets or sets the passphrase for the private key.
FileTransferProtocol Protocol = FileTransferProtocol.Sftp [get, set]
Gets or sets the file transfer protocol to use.
TimeSpan ConnectionTimeout = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(30) [get, set]
Gets or sets the connection timeout.
TimeSpan OperationTimeout = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(60) [get, set]
Gets or sets the operation timeout for read/write operations.
bool AutoCreateDirectory = true [get, set]
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically create remote directories.
int BufferSize = 32 * 1024 [get, set]
Gets or sets the buffer size for file transfers.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Configuration options for file transfer services.
These options configure the connection to FTP/SFTP servers.
For SFTP, you can use either password authentication or private key authentication.

bool Toolbox.Core.Options.FileTransferOptions.AutoCreateDirectory = true[get], [set]

true to auto-create directories; otherwise, false. Default is true.
